pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wine Mono is a package containing Mono and other projects, intended as a replacement for the .NET runtime and class libraries in Wine. It works in conjunction with Wine's builtin mscoree.dll, and it is not intended to be useful for any other purpose.

use.flag: Install pre-unpacked files which do not need to be copied into the Wine prefix (note that this requires the default top-level Z: drive to be kept for out-of-prefix files to be readable)
